name: Wingovers Opposite
description: Series of pendulum turns with change of direction each time
minimum: twice to one side, twice to the other side with high angle (minimum 135Â°) the pilots perform the turns to the opposite direction of each other

criterias.normal: rhythm, flow, trajectory, angle (the higher the better)
criterias.twisted: must be twisted during the entry and stay twisted until the glider stabilises
